message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $70 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $85. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Can you meet me in the middle?
